movie.title: Ivan's Childhood
movie.description_intro: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.
movie.description_full: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.

movies.title: Varsity Punks
movies.summary: When star high school quarterback AJ Montoya breaks his hand his only hope is to team up with his longtime rivals, the cross country team--a group of nerds and misfits with potential for high school glory.
movies.description_full: When star high school quarterback AJ Montoya breaks his hand his only hope is to team up with his longtime rivals, the cross country team--a group of nerds and misfits with potential for high school glory.
movies.synopsis: When star high school quarterback AJ Montoya breaks his hand his only hope is to team up with his longtime rivals, the cross country team--a group of nerds and misfits with potential for high school glory.

movies.title: Arena
movies.summary: David Lord finds himself forced into the savage world of a modern gladiatorial arena, where men fight to the death for the entertainment of the online masses.
movies.description_full: David Lord finds himself forced into the savage world of a modern gladiatorial arena, where men fight to the death for the entertainment of the online masses.
movies.synopsis: David Lord finds himself forced into the savage world of a modern gladiatorial arena, where men fight to the death for the entertainment of the online masses.

movies.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
movies.title_english: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
movies.title_long: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)
movies.summary: Cornelius and Zira's son Caesar leads apes to revolution in this installment of the apes saga. Dogs and cats have been wiped out by a plague and now apes are household pets that are treated like slaves. Caesar has the intelligence to fight this oppression.
movies.description_full: Cornelius and Zira's son Caesar leads apes to revolution in this installment of the apes saga. Dogs and cats have been wiped out by a plague and now apes are household pets that are treated like slaves. Caesar has the intelligence to fight this oppression.
movies.synopsis: Cornelius and Zira's son Caesar leads apes to revolution in this installment of the apes saga. Dogs and cats have been wiped out by a plague and now apes are household pets that are treated like slaves. Caesar has the intelligence to fight this oppression.

movies.title: Portrait of Animal Behavior
movies.summary: A passionate marine biologist on a trip to observe elusive wild dolphins happens upon an attractive young woman on the side of the road. Her company soon reveals that human actions are the most fascinating animal behavior of all.
movies.description_full: A passionate marine biologist on a trip to observe elusive wild dolphins happens upon an attractive young woman on the side of the road. Her company soon reveals that human actions are the most fascinating animal behavior of all.
movies.synopsis: A passionate marine biologist on a trip to observe elusive wild dolphins happens upon an attractive young woman on the side of the road. Her company soon reveals that human actions are the most fascinating animal behavior of all.
